packages.name: Dubai Highlights Package
packages.description: Discover the glamour of Dubai with a city tour, Desert Safari, Dhow Cruise, and Burj Khalifa access. Package includes flights, 3-star hotel stay, and airport transfers.

packages.name: Europe Delights
packages.description: Explore Europe's iconic landmarks and cultures. Visit Paris, Lucerne, and Rome with guided city tours, hotel stays, intercity travel, and visa assistance.

packages.name: Spiritual Varanasi Tour
packages.description: A spiritual retreat to the holy city. Attend the Ganga Aarti, visit Kashi Vishwanath Temple, and soak in the cultural heritage. Includes hotel, breakfast, and sightseeing.

packages.name: Andaman Island Escape
packages.description: Relax on tropical beaches and explore coral reefs. Package includes hotel accommodation, breakfast, ferry transfers, and sightseeing at Radhanagar Beach and Cellular Jail.1234

packages.name: Himalayan Bliss
packages.description: A spiritual and scenic adventure with mountain views, temples, and cultural heritage.

packages.name: South African Safari
packages.description: Witness the Big Five, taste local wine, and visit Table Mountain and coastal Cape Town.
